data.actual_result: Image before step 4 is shown for a split second
data.expected_result: Photo taken should be shown immediately
data.short_description: Old image is shown in preview after taking a picture
data.steps_to_repro: - Press the ➕ in the send message box - Select any image - Exit out the image picker - On the image preview bar, press the X sign to cancel - Press the ➕ button again, and switch to the camera tab - Take a picture without expanding the camera - Observe the preview bar
